title: Pale Flower Of Darkness
opening: They follow the Black Fang due south. Although the trail vanishes, Lyn uses her tracking skills, and the pursuit continues. The path leads up into Bern's impassable mountains. The peaks know no seasons, and the snow covers all in a bright blanket. In this land of blinding reflections, an ancient castle appears.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: So, in the end, you failed to defeat them, didn't you?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: I only introduced you to Lord Nergal out of respect for your rank. I was mistaken, though, to think that a former royal soldier would be--

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: Next time will be different, I swear it. I beg of you, give me one more chance!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Ha ha ha... "One more chance"? Surely you jest.

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: Without Lord Nergal's good word, I'll never fly again! Not as a royal wyvern knight, at least! Please! Another chance!!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Ah, but you're quite skilled at begging, at least. Desist. You have fallen from our graces, and nothing will change that. Just be grateful. You are an outsider, so you are spared the Fang's judgement.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: You stink of failure. Leave me to breathe in peace.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: That wyvern rider.. That was the same woman we fought earlier. This proves that they took this mountain path.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Now... What have we here... What a complicated place.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: It's little more than whispers, but I can hear human voices.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Over there! Let's go take a look.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Marcus! Wait here with Ninian and everyone else. Be ready to escape at any time. I'm counting on you!

intro.speaker: Marcus
intro.line: Yes, sir. I will not fail.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Really? You're giving me a mission? Really and truly!? Mother!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: I am. And it's a very big job at that. ...It's for the king of Bern.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: The king!? Such an important job... for me?

intro.speaker: Brendan
intro.line: Sonia? I'm against this!! Giving such a dangerous job to this child...

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Father?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: ...You're right, this really is a job for your sons. However, we've seen nothing of them since their last report.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Lloyd... Linus......

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: So my daughter will do this. And I will have no complaints from you about it.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Ah! Father......

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: ...You may do as you please!!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: But...

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: First, business! Jaffar! Come!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Jaffar!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Look! That man! He was at the Dragon's Gate.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Nergal's henchman. No question about it.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Jaffar! Should you be up? Don't your wounds hurt?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Must you be so discourteous? It really is quite irritating. You heard the king's request, did you not?

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Prince Zephiel... He wants him assassinated.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: What? The prince? The king wants to kill the prince? Why? He's his son, isn't he?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Nino! Be quiet.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Ah... I'm sorry.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Jaffar, this mission is yours... and you're to take Nino.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: ......You're not serious?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Yes, I'm serious. This girl is my daughter. She must prove herself as soon as possible.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: ...Don't do this. This is too much for her.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: As long as you're with her, there should be no problem. I'll brook no disagreement. We must have the king in our debt. Those are Lord Nergal's explicit orders.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Nino! You understand the consequences if you fail, don't you?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Um... Yes.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Then we're off to investigate the prince's manse. I'll provide more details on the way there.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Jerme!

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: Yes?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Where is Brendan? He just left the room.

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: He went outside with Jan.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: ......I wonder what he's about... ...I'll deal with it later. Listen, Jerme. You're in charge of the guard while I'm gone. Do not let anything happen to the item.

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: In charge of the guard... Bah! I was top dog until that cretin Jaffar showed up.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Jerme!

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: ...I know, I know!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Kenneth!

intro.speaker: Kenneth
intro.line: Yes, Lady Sonia.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Where is Brendan? He just left the room.

intro.speaker: Kenneth
intro.line: He went outside with Jan.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: ......I wonder what he's about... ...I'll deal with it later. Listen, Kenneth. You're in charge of the guard while I'm gone. Do not let anything happen to the item.

intro.speaker: Kenneth
intro.line: Understood. I will guard it with my life.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Do they seriously mean to assassinate the prince?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Aye. On the orders of the king, it would seem. Unbelievable...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: The Emblem is essential to the prince's ceremony, right? Having the Emblem becomes useless if the prince is dead!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: We must stop the assassination! The girl, Nino... If we speak to her she might understand.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Jaffar looks like a dangerous man... But we have no other course of action.

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: Oh, here you are! How delicious! My blade shall feast well tonight, won't it?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Oh!!

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: Now, which...one...first? Wait! Hold it! There are some nasty ones mixed in with the rest. Mustn't get one of them. Might ruin my sword's appetite. You don't mind do you? If I do it this way?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: That's...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Eliwood! There's no reason to treat with that madman!! We must find the exit...

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: You! Woman! You have beautiful skin. If I sliced you into lovely red ribbons with this, would the pieces be as soft and delicate as silk?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: You...

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: It's no good! Something's blocking our way. We can't get out!!

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: I can feel an evil power emanating from every foe here. If we do not defeat them all, the barrier will hold strong.

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: Hyaa ha ha ha haaa! That's Lord Nergal's doing! He knows how I love to slice through people. He lets me do it as often as I want, which really is all the time. He's after something he calls "quintessence"... I care nothing for it, but... as long as he keeps bringing me people to slash and cut! I am Jerme! The finest assassin the Black Fang have ever known! Now come! My blade hungers!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Gone...

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...It's all right. He's still close... In this building...somewhere.

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: We've got to defeat him and destroy this barrier! Otherwise, we'll never leave!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Mark! We have to find that man and escape this place! What are your orders?!

intro.speaker: Kenneth
intro.line: Hello trespassers. I bid you welcome. Imagine, the stronghold of a guild of assassins, infiltrated. Quite amusing, isn't it? Heh heh heh heh.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Oh!!

intro.speaker: Jerme
intro.line: However, you shall not leave. Sonia has given me authority while she is away.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: You... You're a holy man. What are you doing in this place?

intro.speaker: Kenneth
intro.line: Are you referring to my relationship with the "gods"? Are you still held in the thrall of such a concept? You've met Lord Nergal, haven't you? Then there is something you must know. Gods are lies created by the weakness in all mankind. ...If a god truly exists, then it is my lord Nergal. Only him.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Insane...

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Eliwood! Waste no time with that madman!! Let's get out of--

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: We can't! Something's blocking our way. We can't get out!!

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...That man. The one in front of you... A surge of evil...

intro.speaker: Kenneth
intro.line: Nothing is more beautiful than the suffering of men. When I'm watching, I'm afloat in an ocean of pure bliss... I will watch you for a long, long time.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Gone...

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...It's all right. He's still close... In this building...somewhere.

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: We've got to defeat him and destroy this barrier! Otherwise, we'll never leave!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Mark! We have to find that man and escape this place! What are your orders?!

battle.speaker: Geitz
battle.line: Come on, Mark! Do you really want me? Oh, bother. I really hate the cold. What? Everyone's counting on me? ... Oh, fine ...

battle.speaker: Wallace
battle.line: Huh huh huh huh. You’ve done well to choose me for this, Mark! Weaklings! Their pathetic attacks mean nothing to me! I’ll cut through this snow like a new-forged blade!

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Who are you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Karel.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Are you fighting the Black Fang, too?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: I heard the Black Fang was gathering recruits. I'm here to challenge them.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Do you... Do you have a reason to do so?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: My sword is my life. My sword is my reason. You...

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: What?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: You are quite good, but you will improve. Very good. I will join you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: You're going to help me and my friends? But...why?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Someday, you will be a great swordfighter. It would be a waste for that skill to die here. I must have you... stronger. I will wait for that time with much anticipation.

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Shall we continue? The feast awaits...

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Who are you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Karel.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Karel, what are you doing in this place?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: The Black Fang is gathering recruits. I want to hone my blade on them.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: What? Do you have...a reason?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: My sword is my life. My sword is my reason. You...

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: What?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: You are unpolished...but powerful. Very well. I will join you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: You're going to lend us your blade? That's a nice gesture and all, but... Why?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: You will someday be a famed general. It would be a waste for that power to be lost here. I must have you...stronger. I will wait for that time with much anticipation.

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Shall we continue? The feast awaits...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Oh! Who are you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Karel.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: You're a...swordfighter from Sacae. Are you fighting the Black Fang as well?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: The Black Fang is gathering recruits. I want to hone my blade on them.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Why would you... Do you have a reason to?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: My sword is my life. My sword is my reason. You are... So beautiful...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Pardon?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Your blade and mine are different, yet...Your swordplay is truly beautiful. Very well. I will join you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: You're going to help us? But...why?

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Someday you will be a renowned swordfighter. Losing you here would be a waste. I must see you... stronger. I will wait for that time with much anticipation.

recruit-talk.speaker: Karel
recruit-talk.line: Shall we continue. The feast awaits...

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: You... Can it really be? Is it you, Harken?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Wait, please! You're Harken, a knight of Pherae, aren't you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Lord Eliwood?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: I heard that all my father's men had fallen defending him. It's good to see you well. Why didn't you return to Pherae?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I failed in my duty to protect my sworn lord... I am not worthy of the honor of being a knight of Pherae.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Harken...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Before Nergal's magic, we were annihilated. When Lord Elbert was taken away, I was...powerless...

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Nergal...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I heard he shared some connection to the Black Fang. I searched the continent for signs of them... I intended to strike against them with my final breath.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: And that's what brought you here... In that case, Harken, you should come with us.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Forgive me, Lord Eliwood... I would rather die a knight than live in shame. I will trade my life for many of theirs.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Hold! Harken!! Do you think my father would want that?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Lord Eliwood, please...

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Join me, Harken. Neither my father nor I would condone such a senseless death. Help me fulfill my father's one ambition and restore peace.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...I understand. My life is yours. May it serve you better than it served your father.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: You! Can it truly be you, Harken?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Isadora!?

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Wait! You are Harken, a knight of Pherae, are you not?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Isadora...

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: You... You're alive. We'd heard that all of you had perished. Thank goodness... Thank goodness you're well. But how is it that you're here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I failed in my duty to protect my sword lord... I am not worthy of the honor of being a knight of Pherae.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Harken...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Before that man's magic... we were powerless. When Lord Elbert was taken away, I... I could do nothing...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I learned that the man who took Lord Elbert...Nergal, shared some connection to the Black Fang. I searched the continent for signs of them... I intended to strike against them with my final breath.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: ...... Lord Eliwood... He's here, too. Come, Harken. You must join us.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...I cant, Isadora. I would rather die a knight than live in shame. I will trade my life for many of theirs.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Wait! Please, Harken! Don't be foolish!

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Isadora...

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: I've just now found you again when I thought you were lost. If you vanish from my life once more... Please, Harken. Do not waste this chance. I beg of you...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...... I understand. Isadora, I'll do as you ask. My life for my dead lord and for his son, Eliwood.

recruit-talk.speaker: Marcus
recruit-talk.line: Harken! You are a knight of Pherae! It is you, isn't it, Harken?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...... Lord Marcus...

recruit-talk.speaker: Marcus
recruit-talk.line: I received reports that said the entire elite guard had fallen... It looks like you survived. Tell me, why did you not report to Pherae?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I failed in my duty to protect my sword lord... I am not worthy of the honor of being a knight of Pherae.

recruit-talk.speaker: Marcus
recruit-talk.line: Harken...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Before Nergal's magic... we were annihilated. When Lord Elbert was taken away, I was...powerless...

recruit-talk.speaker: Marcus
recruit-talk.line: Nergal...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I learned he shared some connection to the Black Fang. I searched the continent for signs of them... I intended to strike against them with my final breath.

recruit-talk.speaker: Marcus
recruit-talk.line: ...... Harken, come with me. You must aid Lord Eliwood in this war.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: But...I...

recruit-talk.speaker: Marcus
recruit-talk.line: Do not waste the life you swore to Pherae. We are knights, Harken. Be mindful of your oath. You must not die here. For the sake of our fallen master ...live now and, fight.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I understand. My life for my dead lord and for his son, Eliwood.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lowen
recruit-talk.line: You... Can it be? Lord Harken?

recruit-talk.speaker: Lowen
recruit-talk.line: Wait, please. It has to be you... Lord Harken, a knight of Pherae!

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: You... You're one of Lord Marcus's young men.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lowen
recruit-talk.line: Yes! I am Lowen. I'm currently traveling with Lord Eliwood. I'd heard that your entire company fell, Lord Harken... And yet, at least you survived! Lord Eliwood will be pleased. Why... Why are you in this place?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I failed in my duty to protect my sword lord... I am not worthy of the honor of being a knight of Pherae.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lowen
recruit-talk.line: Lord Harken...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Before that monster's magic... we were annihilated. When Lord Elbert was taken away, I was...powerless...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I learned that the man who took Lord Elbert...Nergal, shared some connection to the Black Fang. I searched the continent for signs of them... I intended to strike against them with my final breath.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lowen
recruit-talk.line: What a tale... Come, you can join us, Lord Harken.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I cant, Lowen. I would rather die a knight than live in shame. I will trade my life for many of theirs.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lowen
recruit-talk.line: Wait, please! Lord Elbert would not have wanted this!

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Lowen...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lowen
recruit-talk.line: Please, be prudent. Lord Eliwood, Lord Marcus, and Lady Isabella... I know that none of them would want you to do this.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...... You're right. You speak the truth, young Lowen. Let us go and see Lord Eliwood. My life for my dead lord and for his son, Eliwood.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: You-- It can't be... Harken?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Hey, hang on! Wait a moment! Wait! You're one of Pherae's knights! Harken, right?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...Lord Hector.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: You were one of Lord Elbert's sworn men, right? I'd heard all his knights died on Valor... Why didn't you return and report to Eliwood.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I failed in my duty to protect my sword lord... I am not worthy of the honor of being a knight of Pherae.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Before Nergal's magic, we were annihilated. When Lord Elbert was taken away, I was...powerless...

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: That dog Nergal...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I learned he shared some connection to the Black Fang. I searched the continent for signs of them... I intended to strike against them with my final breath.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: And now you are here. You can fight with us, Harken. Eliwood is here as well.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Forgive me, Lord Hector. I would rather die a knight than live in shame. I will trade my life for many of theirs.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Hold, Harken! Do you think that's what Lord Elbert would ask for?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: I'm not from Pherae, so it may not be my place to say, but... Eliwood waited for you... for any of you to return.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...Lord Eliwood.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Eliwood is in a war. If you're a true knight of Pherae, you need to be by his side.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...I understand. My life is his. May it serve him better than it served his father.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Young sir... Are you not Sir Harken?

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Hold! Are you not Sir Harken, a knight of Pherae?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...Sir Oswin.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: I'd heard that your entire company had fallen. It is good to see that you are alive and well. Is Lord Eliwood aware that you survived?

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I failed in my duty to protect my sword lord... I am not worthy of the honor of being a knight of Pherae.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Sir Harken...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Before Nergal's magic... we were annihilated. When Lord Elbert was taken away, I was...powerless...

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Nergal...

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: I learned that he shared some connection to the Black Fang. I searched the continent for signs of them... I intended to strike against them with my final breath.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: I see... Be that as it may, Lord Harken, you may now travel with us. Lord Eliwood is also with us.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: Please, Sir Oswin... I need you to understand. I would rather die a knight than live in shame. I will trade my life for many of theirs.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Sir Harken, did you not swear a life of service to Pherae?

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: As a knight of Ostia, it may not be my place to speak, but... Lord Eliwood waited for you... for any of you to return.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...Lord Eliwood.

recruit-talk.speaker: Isadora
recruit-talk.line: Lord Eliwood waits for you still. We are knights, bound by duty to the houses we serve. You can still be of service to your lord and master.

recruit-talk.speaker: Harken
recruit-talk.line: ...You are right, Sir Oswin. Forgive my weakness. My life for my dead lord and for his son, Eliwood.

boss.speaker: Kenneth
boss.line: You’re doing much better than I had anticipated. But it’s about time to put an end to this.

boss.speaker: Jerme
boss.line: Hyaaa! I’ll chop you all up into tiny, little pieces!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Everyone is being driven mad by Nergal...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: It must be terrifying, to lose yourself entirely... To fall completely under the sway of Nergal's power... ...Hey! What could this be?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: It can't be... the Fire Emblem?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: So this madman had it all along? Let's take it and go!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: We've finally gotten it back... Let's not waste our good fortune.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Eliwood! There's no reason for us to stay any longer!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: I know! Let's make haste for the manse! We must stop the assassination! We cannot let the prince's life be put in jeopardy!

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: You know your role, yes? The plan must be carried out tonight.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Mother...just once...if only for a little while...may I...hold your hand?

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: Nino, you know how I abhor such displays.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: I... I know. But...I may not get another chance... And I thought...

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: ...Very well.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Huh?

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: If you complete this mission, I'll hold your hand as often as you like. I will even hug you and stroke your face.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Oh, really!? Then I must do my best! I will, I will! I will succeed!! Wait for me, Mother!

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: I will. Be careful!

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: ...All right!! I'll be back!!

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: Ah, Jaffar, wait here for a moment.

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: It's about tonight's mission...

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: What is it?

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: Once you've killed the prince, kill Nino, too.

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: What!?

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: The assassinations... Both come directly by the king's request. The prince is well loved, and his death will trigger much chaos. If the assassin is not caught and hanged immediately, the chaos will engulf Bern. A scapegoat is needed. Do you understand?

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: Nino is your daughter!!

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: She is trash. Garbage. Human refuse. I'm just happy at last to have found a use for her. She did say she would do anything to please her loving mother, did she not? Her death will please me more than her living ever did.

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: ...What is it? Do you have something to say?

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: ......This...has nothing to do with me.

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: When Lord Nergal found you as an orphan, he chose you because of your callous heart and your skill with a blade. Lord Nergal does not give second chances. Do not forget.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...Oswin.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Lord Hector.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Have you heard anything from my brother?

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: When you say anything ...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...Come, you know... About his condition...

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: No, nothing new.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: I see. That’s good.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Why do you ask?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: No reason really. I’m simply concerned for my brother. Earlier... When I saw him in Ostia, he didn’t look well. When father took ill and died... I wonder if he looked at all like that. Forget it, I’m worrying about nothing. If something were wrong, I’m sure we would’ve heard.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Yes, indeed. Now that you mention it, I did forget something. Lord Uther sent word to you through a messenger.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Oh! What did he have to say?

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Don’t trouble Lord Eliwood by being overly obstinate.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Just like my brother! Always the same thing! How many times have I told him to stop treating me like a child!?
